Title: FG sets fresh performance target for paramilitary agencies
Summary: The Federal Government has set a new performance benchmark for all chief executives of the four paramilitary agencies under the Federal Ministry of Interior . Announcing the new benchmark following the 85 per cent rating it received in the performance assessment .

Title: FCC promotes 375 staff in merit-based exercise
Summary: Federal Character Commission has announced the promotion of 375 staff across various cadres . The promotions, approved by the Acting Executive Chairman, Hon. Kayode Oladele, elevated eight Deputy Directors to the rank of Director .

Title: Police nab driver with N1m fake currency in Ibadan
Summary: The Police Command in Oyo State says it has arrested a male driver, (name withheld), allegedly in possession of N1,000,000 fake currency . The Police Public Relations Officer (PPRO) in the state, Adewale Osifeso, made this known in a statement .

Title: Nwoko sues for unity among APC stakeholders in Delta
Summary: Senator Ned Nwoko (APC-Delta) has urged unity among stakeholders of the All Progressives Congress . Senator made the call on Saturday when he hosted a party meeting in Delta . Senator is representing Delta North Senatorial District .

Title: North-East govs raise the alarm over looming floods, food crisis
Summary: Governors of the North-East states have raised concerns over what they described as looming humanitarian and economic challenges in the zone . The governors warned of impending flood disasters and a possible food crisis if urgent interventions are not made . They said credible forecasts indicated that the region could face severe flooding in the coming months .

Title: Sokoto residents seek help after bandits sack eight communities
